TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit MMC_LISTPAD_INFO extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 由 方法填充，以便为列表视图任务板指定标题文本、可选的按钮文本以及可选的按钮命令标识。

span.span: Filled by the method to specify the title text, optional button text, and optional button command identification for a list-view task pad.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要详细了解如何通过 MMC \_ LISTPAD \_ INFO 结构和 Microsoft 管理控制台 (mmc) 进行编程，请参阅 [MMC 程序员指南](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview)。For more information about programming with the MMC\_LISTPAD\_INFO structure and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).
